description: The PAT_CALL_DISP table contains the information regarding the disposition given to a patient during a phone encounter. Each row corresponds to one disposition.

columns.name: LINE_COUNT
columns.description: The line number of the disposition within the encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the encounter. Note: There may be multiple encounters on the same calendar date.

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The disposition given to the patient on the phone.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_LOC_ID
columns.description: The location to which the nurse directed the patient in the disposition.

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_TIME
columns.description: The time the disposition was given.

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_CMT
columns.description: The comment entered by the user when the disposition was given.

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The department to which the nurse directed the patient in the disposition.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the deployment owner for this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The original disposition if the disposition was overridden, or nothing if the disposition was not overridden.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PHONE_DISP_C_NAME

columns.name: SUGGEST_PROTOCOL_ID
columns.description: The most recently used protocol that suggested the original disposition.

columns.name: SUGGEST_PROTOCOL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the protocol.

columns.name: PHONE_DISP_SUGGST_C_NAME
columns.description:
If disposition filtering is turned on, this column stores if a disposition was suggested by a protocol, manually entered, or both suggested and manually entered/edited.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Suggested


Manually Entered


Suggested and Manual
